short_summary: Request for proposals - Snow removal services for Granville Island, Vancouver.
description: Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation (CMHC) requires snow clearing, snow removal, and salting services for Granville Island on an ‘as and when required’ basis with no guaranteed value or volume of work. The term of the agreement resulting from the RFP is expected to be for a period of two years with an option to extend the agreement on the same terms and conditions for up to three additional terms of up to one year each. The anticipated value of the service is estimated to be up to $1,276,000.00 CDN including all applicable taxes.

full_summary:
### Granville Island Snow Clearance Tender
#### Request for Proposal
##### Date Published: 14 September 2023
#### Submission Deadline: 10 October 2023 at 15:00:00

### Description
Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation (CMHC) invites qualified contractors to submit proposals for the provision of snow clearing, snow removal, and salting services for Granville Island. This is an "as and when required" based contract with no guaranteed value or volume of work.

Granville Island is a high-traffic site with complex road and pathway infrastructure, including one-way streets, loading zones, parking lots, pedestrian walkways, bike paths, maintenance yards, and public spaces. The surface profile of the areas to be cleared consists of stone pavers, asphalt, concrete, and wooden surfaces.

A mandatory site visit is scheduled for 26 September 2023 at 10:00 hours (Pacific Daylight Time).

### Contract Details

* Contract Term: 2 years with an option to extend for up to 3 additional terms of 1 year each
* Estimated Value: $1,276,000.00 CAD (all applicable taxes)

### Eligibility Criteria
To be eligible, contractors must have a good understanding of the services required and the complexities of the site.

### Proposal Submission Guidelines
To submit a proposal, prospective contractors must register on the Government of Canada's Buy and Sell website and download the Request for Proposal document.

### Contact Information
For questions regarding this Request for Proposal, please contact Sara Brady at 647-805-3587 or via email at sbrady@cmhc-schl.gc.ca.

### Disclaimer
This Request for Proposal and all subsequent communications and documentation within the RFP process are binding on the successful contractor.

### Supporting Documents
Please note the following attachments:

* RFP-002325-Granville-Island-Snow-Removal-Appendix-D-Form-of-Agreement.pdf
* RFP-002325-Granville-Island-Snow-Removal-Addendum-2.pdf
* RFP-002325-Granville-Island-Snow-Removal-Appendix-C-RFP-Specifications.pdf
* RFP-002325-Granville-Island-Snow-Removal.pdf
* RFP-002325-Granville-Island-Snow-Removal-Appendix-E-Maps.pdf
* RFP-002325-Granville-Island-Snow-Removal-Appendix
